docs.title: Aishwarya P B | QA Specialist
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation site for my Quality Assurance Portfolio. This site provides a deeper dive into the technical details, methodologies, and projects that define my career as a QA specialist.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: I am a Quality Assurance specialist with nearly 6 years of experience in testing and analysis. This documentation is designed to complement my main portfolio website, providing structured information for recruiters and fellow engineers.

docs.title: Key Highlights
docs.text:
• 5+ Years Experience: Proven track record in Automation and Manual Testing.
  • Automation Expert: Proficient in Selenium, Playwright, and Robot Framework.
  • Full Stack Testing: Experienced in Web, API, and Backend (SQL/Unix) validation.
  • Agile Practitioner: Deep understanding of Agile methodologies and CI/CD integration.

"Quality is not an act, it is a habit." — Aristotle

docs.title: Journey in Quality Assurance
docs.text: I am a passionate Quality Assurance Specialist based in Bangalore, India. My journey in tech is driven by an obsession with precision and a commitment to digital excellence.

docs.title: Tata Consultancy Services (Oct 2022 - Present)
docs.text: As a QA Specialist at TCS, I focus on end-to-end functional and backend testing for large-scale enterprise applications. I have been instrumental in: - Developing robust automated scripts using Playwright and Selenium. - Implementing Page Object Model (POM) frameworks to enhance script maintainability. - Ensuring data integrity through deep SQL and Unix-based validation.

docs.title: Data Template InfoTech Pvt. Ltd (Jan 2020 - Oct 2022)
docs.text: In my previous role, I worked across various web and enterprise applications, mastering the art of: - Script design using Selenium, Robot Framework, and Cucumber (BDD). - API and Web Service validation using Postman. - Collaborating within Agile teams to iterate quickly without compromising quality.

docs.title: Personal Philosophy
docs.text: I believe that testing is not just about finding bugs; it's about understanding the user's journey and ensuring every interaction is seamless and reliable. My background in electronics and communication engineering (B.E.) provides me with a solid foundation for logical troubleshooting and system analysis.

docs.title: Featured Projects
docs.text: Detailed look at the projects featured in the portfolio, showcasing the QA challenges and solutions applied.

docs.title: 1. Global Credit Risk System
docs.text: Role: QA Engineer Domain: Finance/FinTech - Description: A critical financial application for risk assessment. - QA Impact: Developed detailed test scenarios to cover complex compliance rules; performed extensive backend testing to ensure data accuracy in risk reports.

docs.title: 2. PAMS (Political Activities Management System)
docs.text: Role: QA Analyst Domain: Compliance - Description: Managing employee activity requests globally. - QA Impact: Designed workflow-based test cases; validated complex notification triggers and rule-based workflows.

docs.title: 3. Miles and More
docs.text: Role: Automation Test Engineer Domain: Logistics/Airline - Description: Lufthansa’s loyalty platform. - QA Impact: Optimized the regression suite by 30% through modular scripting in Playwright and integrated it into Jenkins for automated feedback.

docs.title: 4. Whiteboard.chat
docs.text: Role: QA Engineer Domain: EdTech - Description: Real-time collaboration platform. - QA Impact: Ensured cross-browser stability for real-time features using Selenium and Robot Framework.

docs.title: 5. iFlight-Neo
docs.text: Role: QA Engineer Domain: Airline Operations - Description: Flight scheduling and crew management. - QA Impact: Conducted rigorous API validation and regression testing in fast-paced Agile sprints.

docs.title: QA Expertise
docs.text: My technical expertise spans across various layers of the software testing life cycle, ensuring comprehensive coverage and high reliability.

docs.title: Selenium (Java)
docs.text:
• Extensive experience in building maintainable test suites.
  • Implementation of Page Object Model (POM).
  • Cross-browser and parallel execution.

docs.title: Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript)
docs.text:
• Modern automation for fast, reliable end-to-end testing.
  • Leveraging trace viewers and auto-waiting for stable scripts.

docs.title: Robot Framework & Cucumber
docs.text:
• Keyword-driven and Behavior Driven Development (BDD) approaches.
  • Creating human-readable test scenarios for better collaboration with business stakeholders.

docs.title: API & Web Services
docs.text:
• Skilled in using Postman for functional and automated API testing.
  • Validating JSON/XML responses, status codes, and latency.

docs.title: Backend & Database
docs.text:
• Proficiency in SQL for data validation and integrity checks.
  • Working knowledge of Unix/Linux environments for log analysis and backend process monitoring.

docs.title: Tools & Lifecycle
docs.text:
• JIRA & HP ALM: Advanced defect tracking and test management.
  • Git & Jenkins: Integration of automated tests into CI/CD pipelines.
  • Agile/Scrum: Active participation in sprint planning, retrospectives, and continuous delivery.

docs.title: Technology Stack
docs.text: The website_anti portfolio is built using modern web standards to ensure speed, accessibility, and a premium visual experience.

docs.title: Front-end Core
docs.text:
• HTML5: Semantic structure for better SEO and accessibility.
  • Vanilla CSS3: Custom styles without the overhead of heavy frameworks, utilizing modern features like CSS variables and Flexbox/Grid.
  • Vanilla JavaScript (ES6+): Custom animations and interactive elements.

docs.title: Libraries & Integration
docs.text:
• Particles.js: For the dynamic, interactive particle background in the hero section.
  • Lucide Icons: Clean and consistent iconography throughout the site.
  • Google Fonts: Using 'Inter' for readability and 'Outfit' for a premium, modern feel.

docs.title: Documentation Engine
docs.text:
• MkDocs: Static site generator geared towards project documentation.
  • Material for MkDocs: A powerful theme providing a professional, responsive interface with search and navigation capabilities.
